Who: DARK RODIMUS, Nightlight
Location: Black Fortress - Research/Panic Room

> Hydras send a secret comlink to Rodimus "Go to reseach area and protect the Lady, if things goes wrong take her to the old Predacon base. Mask your signatures in order avoid the capture"
>
> Nightlight was iniside the Panic Room and she was full of fear.

Rodimus, who had been standing guard outside Nightlight's door quickly
answered Hydras, "I'm here already sir, Perceptor had sent me."

When the lights shut off Rodimus tapped in his command code on the
panic room and waited for the doors to slide open. He quickly stepped
inside the room and shined his headlights illuminating the chamber. As
the doors slid closed behind him he locked the door and continued to
look around, his every sense on alert.

"Nightlight, you okay?"

(TAG)

Preston
